updated_cases.title: Validate Bypass traffic with PXC/EP-proxy Access method; Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy/edge proxy
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Steering Exception - Bypass traffic - PXC/EX-proxy ACM
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create steering exception for one of the domain configured in egerss Ip policy
- Route the traffic through PXC/EPproxy access method for a domain configured 
- Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy - Hence NO Egress IP being applied.
-  Need to review with DEV on this test case
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify there is no Regression noted.
- Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy - Hence NO Egress IP being applied.

updated_cases.title: Validate Bypass traffic with TCP - Tunnel based bypass for cert pinned app; with FF 'egress-ip-bypass-proxy' Enabled; Egress IP policy match
updated_cases.custom_preconds: TCP Cert Pinned app + Tunnel mode Bypass traffic
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create and add Cert pinned app streeing exception with Tunnel mode bypass for all domains using *
- Enable TENANT based FF 'egress-ip-bypass-proxy'  Existing FF to apply Dedicated EgressIP for Tunel mode Cert pinned app steering exception ( TCP bypass listner).
- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy with one or more matching attributes [possibly ifconfig.me domain] for cert pinned app
- Review appmodule 3 logs for TCP bypass listner and make sure Dedicated egress IP applied REGARDLESS of egressIP policy match. [Dev to confirm on this scenario].
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify Traffic for cert pinned app for Tunnel mode app  works as expcted for end user
- Verify  appmodule 3 logs for TCP bypass listner and make sure Dedicated egress IP applied REGARDLESS of egressIP policy match. [Dev to confirm on this scenario].
- Verify appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Policy2 DOESNOT SHOW EGRESSIP POLICY SCANNING.

- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy with one or more matching attributes [possibly ifconfig.me domain] for cert pinned app

updated_cases.title: Validate Bypass traffic with TCP - Tunnel based bypass for cert pinned app; with FF 'egress-ip-bypass-proxy' Disabled,  Egress IP policy match
updated_cases.custom_preconds: TCP Cert Pinned app + Tunnel mode Bypass traffic
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create and add Cert pinned app streeing exception with Tunnel mode bypass for all domains using *
- Disable TENANT based FF 'egress-ip-bypass-proxy' -  do not apply DEI for TCP Bypass listner
- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy with one or more matching attributes [possibly ifconfig.me domain] for cert pinned app
 
- Review appmodule 3 logs for TCP bypass listner and make sure Dedicated egress IP is NOT applied and proxy default public IP is being used.
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify Traffic for cert pinned app for Tunnel mode app works as expcted for end user
- Verify  NO Dedicated egress IP applied REGARDLESS of egressIP policy match. [Dev to confirm on this scenario].

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL DND traffic with NSClient Access method; Applied Dedicated EgressIP on Nsproxy ; No change in behavior;  Egress IP policy match
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create SSL DND policy for a domain/category/ supported attribute
- Route the traffic through NS-Client for a domain configured in SSL DND policy and EgressIP policy
- Review that DEI is being applied, only if egressIP policy match.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Validate DEI is being applied, only if egressIP policy match. 
- Capture so_mark and user-hash from proxy logs and validate DEI is applied
- Validate SSL DND policy applied and page events generated.

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL DND traffic with NSClient Access method; Applied Dedicated EgressIP on Nsproxy ; No change in behavior;  Egress IP policy does NOT match
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create and SSL DND policy for a domain/category/ supported attribute
- Route the traffic through NS-Client for a domain configured in SSL DND policy and not matching egressIP Policy
- Review that DEI is NOT applied, WHEN egressIP policy is not matched
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Validate DEI is NOT applied, WHEN egressIP policy is not matched
- Capture so_mark and user-hash from proxy logs and validate DEI is applied
- Validate SSL DND policy applied and page events generated.

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL DND traffic with NSClient Access method; Applied Dedicated EgressIP on Nsproxy ; No change in behavior; With empty egerss IP policy - All Traffic
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create an empty Egress IP policy
- Create and SSL DND policy for a domain/category/ supported attribute
- Route the traffic through NS-Client for a domain configured in SSL DND policy
- Review that DEI is being applied, as empty policy is match
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Create SSL DND policy (Domain/Category/Network location/User) 
- Capture so_mark and user-hash from proxy logs and validate DEI is applied
- Validate SSL DND policy applied and page events generated.

updated_cases.title: Validate SSL DND traffic with pxc/ep-proxy Access method; Applied Dedicated EgressIP on EDGE-Proxy ,  Egress IP policy match
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create an empty egressip Policy
-  Create and SSL DND policy for a domain/category/ supported attribute
- Route the traffic through PXC/EX-proxy access method for a domain configured in SSL DND policy
- Review that DEI is being applied on Edge-proxy for bypassed traffic, when egressip policy is matched
- Review page event for the same
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Create SSL DND policy (Domain/Category/Network location/User) 
- Capture so_mark and user-hash from proxy logs and validate DEI is applied
- Validate SSL DND policy applied and page events generated.
